data.label: 腾讯语音识别
data.description: 腾讯云语音识别 ASR SDK 提供服务端、客户端、前端以及小程序 SDK ，给您提供了一种方便、快捷、灵活的方式，将语音识别功能集成到您的服务。

data.label: Tencent Speech Recognition
data.description: Tencent Cloud Speech Recognition ASR SDK provides server-side, client-side, front-end, and mini-program SDKs, offering a convenient, fast, and flexible way to integrate speech recognition functionality into your services.
